subject: Horse Racing
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Belmont Stakes
Big Brown (Race Horse)
I'll Have Another (Race Horse)
lead_paragraph: Since 1978, 12 horses who won the Kentucky Derby and the Preakness have failed to capture the Belmont, one missing glory by a nose, others in a landslide.
snippet: Since 1978, 12 horses who won the Kentucky Derby and the Preakness have failed to capture the Belmont, one missing glory by a nose, others in a landslide.
